description: Automated content creation for blogs and social media using GPT-4

config.prompt:
Write a 1200-word SEO-optimized blog post with the following specifications:

Topic: {{content_brief.topic}}
Target Keywords: {{content_brief.target_keywords}}
Tone: {{content_brief.tone}}
Research: {{research_data}}

Brand Voice Guidelines:
- Professional yet approachable
- Data-driven with storytelling
- Action-oriented conclusions
- UK English spelling

Structure:
- Compelling H1 title (include target keyword)
- Introduction with hook (150 words)
- 4-5 H2 sections with supporting H3s
- Include statistics from research
- Actionable conclusion
- Meta description (155 characters)

SEO Requirements:
- Target keyword in first 100 words
- 2-3% keyword density
- Internal linking opportunities (note [LINK] where relevant)
- Include related keywords naturally

Repurpose this blog post into social media content:

{{blog_post_content}}

Generate:
1. 5 LinkedIn posts (varying angles: statistic highlight, question, case study, tip, CTA)
2. 10 Twitter/X posts (each under 280 chars, thread-worthy)
3. 3 Instagram captions (engaging, emoji-friendly, hashtag suggestions)
4. 1 Email newsletter snippet (150 words with CTA)

Format as JSON with platform, content, and character count.

config.subject: New AI-Generated Content Ready for Review

business_value.output_increase: 4x more content (5 posts → 20 posts per week)

compliance_notes: Human review required for brand-critical content
Add proper disclosures if discussing products/services
